original_text: The Lord has greatly blessed my master, and he has become great. He has given him flocks and herds, silver and gold, male servants and female servants, camels and donkeys.
korean_text: 여호와께서 나의 주인에게 크게 복을 주시어 창성하게 하시되 소와 양과 은금과 종들과 낙타와 나귀를 그에게 주셨고

sentences.original_text: The Lord has greatly blessed my master
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 나의 주인을 크게 복 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He has given him flocks and herds
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 양 떼와 소 떼를 주셨습니다
